DS_MapGuide.value: We’re supposed to go to that historic landmark, right? I’d better start by heading over to the cherry trees.
I should probably talk to Minoru, Saki, or some of the others.
Better make my way to the mountain road.
What happened here? Maybe I should ask that police officer.
I should touch base with Aoi.
I ought to talk to that police officer again.
Better head after Saki and the others.
So what do we do now? I feel like we should all talk this out.
I think the thing to do is to look around that weird forest.
I’m not sure what our next move should be. I’d better discuss this with the others.
I should try investigating with my camera.
I’d better talk to the professor.
There’s something about these murals. I kind of want to investigate them.
I feel like the first thing to do is to look around the area.
I should try investigating with my camera.
Find some medicine for Labramon.
Now that you’ve found the medicine, head back into the hall.
I should try investigating with my camera.
Aoi has to be in the school somewhere.
We’re trapped inside! We’d better find Aoi fast!
Is this place really haunted? I should check out the hallway that leads to the music room.
Well, so much for getting into the music room. I’d better keep looking elsewhere.
I think Aoi might be in the gym. Which means there must be some way to get inside...
Could there really be another child in here? I should try checking places a kid might hide.
I’d better talk with everyone here in the school.
First things first, we need food. I think I’ll see if I can find any nearby.
Well, we’ve got water, but we still might be in trouble. I should keep looking around for anything that might be useful.
This food should be enough to make do, but I ought to keep looking around for more useful stuff.
Looks like we can forget about electricity, but it wouldn’t hurt to do a little more searching.
I’m not getting a cell phone signal anywhere, either. Still, I guess I can keep looking for stuff.
Okay, this is enough to meet our basic needs. Time to regroup with the others.
The forest near the school seems like the best place to start. I should head there.
I’d better talk with Aoi and the others.
I should ask the professor about what happened.
I ought to discuss what to do next with Minoru and the others.
Now to try using my camera to see if I can find any clues.
There may be more footprints to find. I should keep looking around with my camera.
Where could Saki be? I’d better search the area.
Where could Saki be? I’d better keep searching the area.
We ought to head over to the canal that Gomamon described.
What do we do now? Maybe the professor will know.
Shuuji and Saki must be at the dam! We’d better get there quick!
Seems like the group is divided over what we should do. Maybe talking to people one-on-one would help.
There’s still time before noon. I should keep talking with the others.
It’s almost noon. I’d better check in with the others one more time to make sure I didn’t forget anything.
If we’re headed to the radio tower, we’ll have to start by taking the trail to the mountain pass.
Kaito’s arguing with some woman I’ve never seen before. I’d better ask what happened.
I’m not sure what to do next. Maybe I should ask Kaito.
I’m not sure what to do next. Maybe I should ask Kaito.
At this rate, Kaito is going to go look for Miu by himself. I need to search the school and its surroundings to get everyone together first.
We’ll have to go through the forest if we want to reach the amusement park.
The mountain pass should give us a good view of the area. Let’s head there.
I ought to check in with the others.
We should head into the forest by the amusement park.
What do we do now? I think this calls for a group discussion.
Where could Miu have gone? She must be in this park somewhere.
Well, the Kemonogami ran away. Guess it’s back to searching the area.
The Kemonogami ran away again. We’ll have to try searching more thoroughly.
We need to stay on the Kemonogami’s trail! Let’s head down this castle corridor.
Now to take the next corridor and stay on the Kemonogami’s trail.
We can’t lose the trail now! Time to head down this third corridor.
We should be getting close to finding this “queen.” Let’s see if she’s down this new corridor we found.
We’ve been trapped in a cell, but I feel like if we look around we might be able to find a way out.
Where could Miu be hiding now? Guess we’ll just have to search the park again.
Where did Miu go? Maybe if I try talking with the others, we’ll be able to figure something out.
Just where is Miu hiding? I guess all we can do is keep searching.
Things are sure to get more dangerous from here on out. I’d better talk with the others now, before that happens.
I have no idea what our next move should be. Maybe if I talk with Minoru and the others, we’ll think of something.
How do we get into this underground waterway? Maybe I can learn something by searching the entrance.
This is terrible! We’ve all been separated! Where’s Agumon? I need to find him!
I hope Aoi is okay. We’d better try and find her next!
Okay, it turns out Aoi’s all right. Now to track down Labramon.
I hope Saki’s not hurt or anything. We should go meet up with her.
This is good. We’ve found Saki. Next is Floramon.
I hope Miu’s doing okay. We’d better go look for her.
Fortunately, Miu was unhurt. Now to look for the real Shakomon.
That just leaves Shuuji and Lopmon. I hope they’re all right.
Shuuji seems like he’s really losing it! I’m not sure what to do, though. I’d better ask Kaito and the others.
Everyone is exhausted. Maybe talking would help make them feel better.
Seems like everyone’s still on edge. I feel like we should try moving on for a change of pace.
Where could Falcomon have gone? I feel like he’s probably somewhere in either the shopping district or the apartment complex.
Falcomon’s gone off again. Guess we’ll have to track him down one more time.
There could be just about anything inside the apartment complexes. Maybe we should search those more.
We need to get Minoru and Falcomon to make up, even if that means searching the shopping district and residential area from top to bottom.
Minoru and Falcomon really aren’t getting along. I feel like the thing to do now is to give them some space.
It’s about time to head over to the enemy base. I’d better check in with everyone before we go.
There’s still some time before we need to leave. I should talk to Agumon and the others while I have the chance.
We’re finally coming up on the enemy base. It should be at the end of the underground waterway.
We’re getting close to the base now. We just need to get through this forest.
I feel like there’s something around here. I should check with my camera.
Hmm, looks like I might find something if I head to the shopping district.
There’s probably something around here, too. Maybe looking around with my camera will help me find it.
I should start by heading over to the residential area to see if I can learn something.
The air is tense. I bet I’ll find something if I use my camera.
What was that? I’d better go investigate the other area in the apartment complex.
This factory sure is strange. I’d better look around real carefully.
I’m not sure what to do next. Maybe talking with the professor will give me some idea.
I’ve really got to keep my eyes peeled looking around this factory.
Hmm, maybe if I talk with the professor again, he’ll know what to do.
Something’s going on in that building to the north! We should check it out.
We gotta get to the heart of this factory to save Miyuki!
What is going on right now? Maybe talking to these people will help straighten things out.
I need more information. I’ll have to talk to some people inside.
What did I miss? I should talk to the others to find out.
We need to find Jijimon. We’ll have to search the park.
What did I miss? I should talk to the others to find out.
We need to find Jijimon. We’ll have to search the park.
What did I miss? I should talk to the others to find out.
We need to find Jijimon. We’ll have to search the park.
What did I miss? I should talk to the others to find out.
We need to find Jijimon. We’ll have to search the park.
I’d better talk with the others about what to do next, so Jijimon’s death won’t have been in vain.
While Aoi and Kaito are out gathering food, I should check in to see how the others are doing.
I guess we’d better head to this library.
Maybe there are some clues about where to find the others in the library.
I should check in with everyone now that we’re all around the school.
Kaito doesn’t seem up to talking right now. I’d better give him some space.
How can I help Kaito and the others?! There must be some sort of clue in the library!
Looks like we’ve been separated. Guess I’d better search this library from top to bottom.
I should check in with everyone now that we’re all around the school.
I should check in with everyone now that we’re all around the school.
Aoi’s in trouble! If I search the library, maybe I’ll find some clue about how to help her!
Looks like we’ve been separated. Guess I’d better search this library from top to bottom.
I should talk with the others about what to do next as we search the amusement park.
Where’s this shrine to one of the Four Holy Beasts? I’ll have to search this area very carefully.
I think sticking with Minoru and the others is the best way to look for this Holy Beast shrine.
I’d better touch base with my friends before we head into the shrine.
Okay, time to set out for the shrine!
There’s no sign of Pinochimon. Maybe I should try searching another level.
Now where might we find that Magatama? I’d better try looking outside.
Where’d Kaito go? I’ll have to search the area to find him.
Where did Kaito get off to? I’d better look extra carefully.
Where could Aoi have wandered off to? We should all split up to try and find her.
We’ve got to be coming up on a major battle. I’d better check in with my friends to see how they’re doing.
I think I’ll look around the northern end of the underground waterway. There should be some clue there about the next Holy Beast shrine.
Maybe I ought to keep searching down at the southern end of the underground waterway.
I’ll need to keep an eye out for Piemon’s followers while I keep searching.
I feel like I should see what’s going on with Piemon’s followers.
I’ve got to find the others! I’ll have to look around for clues.
We need to find Kaito and Miyuki. They must be somewhere in the inner shrine.
We need to find Aoi and Miyuki. They must be somewhere in the inner shrine.
There’s still some time before dinner. I should go chat with the others.
I don’t know about this ghost, but I’d better check in on the others.
Did Ryo and Saki really both see a ghost? I’ll have to fill everyone in just in case.
Can we actually get this ghost to show up? We’d better look around the school to make sure.
I have to follow Agumon! Is he still in the hall?
Okay, now I just need to trace the noise using the camera on my cell phone.
Looks like that passage at the bottom of the well is the only way forward.
Everyone’s getting ready for the final battle. I’d better see how they’re doing.
To get to the inner shrine, we’ll have to go through the forest first.
Okay, now we just head to the shrine.
On to the entrance to the inner shrine.
The Master’s in here somewhere!
The Master must be in here. Let’s keep going deeper into the inner shrine.
We’re almost down to the lowest level of the inner shrine. Just a little farther.
I should talk with the others.
There’s definitely something about these murals. Let’s investigate them again.
This is it. We’re coming up on the final battle. Time for one last conversation with my friends.
